description:
## Practice on SHACL part II ### Given the [lcc dataset](https://github.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/blob/main/resources/siotrx/actions/shacl/lcc-dataset.ttl) and the shape define in the [previous practice](https://helio-playground.linkeddata.es/tour/SIoTRx%20practice%20on%20actions/Practice%20on%20SHACL%20part%20I) validate the dataset using the [SHACL validator action](https://github.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-action-shacl-validator). Check the results obtained with the **expected results**.

If you need a hint on how to use the SHACL validator action check out [its tutorials](https://helio-playground.linkeddata.es/tour/SIoTRx%20tutorial%20on%20actions/SHACL%20validation%20-%20part%20I)
solution_template:
<#-- Shape --> 
<#assign shape>
@prefix schema: <http://schema.org/> .
@prefix sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#> .
@prefix ex: <http://shacl-practice.helio/resource/>.

ex:CivicStructureShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:CivicStructure .

ex:MuseumShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:Museum .

ex:UniversityShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:CollegeOrUniversity .
</#assign>

<#-- RDF data -->
<#assign rdf="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/siotrx/actions/shacl/lcc-dataset.ttl">

<#-- Running the validation -->
<#assign config="{\"shape\" : \""+shape+"\" }">
<@action type="ShaclValidator" data=rdf conf=config; report>
[=report]
</@action>
